description: Creeping bent grass (Agrostis palustris NO MOW) offers a unique and stylish low-maintenance lawn. It grows in a dense, tightly knit structure and is ideal for shady spots, having an astonishingly low water requirement. It is a great choice for environmentally conscious homeowners, as it does not require mowing and is rarely bothered by weeds. Colorful shade loving wildflowers can be added to the mix for a beautiful aesthetic effect. It will spread slowly, so homeowners can enjoy a low-maintenance lawn that will last decades without having to spend too much time on lawn care.
